subject: [junit] Functional testing
msgSnippet: I am looking for a functional testing framework (based on or similar to JUnit). We need to record and perform regression testing for a variety of text formats
messageBody:
I am looking for a functional testing framework (based on or similar to
JUnit).

We need to record and perform regression testing for a variety of text
formats and media, e.g. HTML/JavaScript over HTTP and XML generated inside
Java. I wonder if there are any tools like these, or we need to build one
using JUnit, HttpUnit and in house functional testing harness?

Thank you.


Joseph Sheinis jsheinis@...
CaseBank Technologies (905) 792-0618 ext. 551
